text: f'in kunt -ayha alrswl- fi rayb min hqyqt ma akhbrnak bih fas'al aladhin yqrwwn alkitab min qablik min 'ahl altawrat wal'injyl, fa'iina dhlk thabt fi ktbhm, laqad ja'ak alhaqu alyaqin min rabik bi'anak rasul allh, wa'ana hwla' alyhwd walnsara yaelamun sihat dhlk, wyjdwn sftk fi ktbhm, wlknhm yunkirun dhlk mae eilmuhum bh, fala tkwnnn min alshakkin fi sihat dhlk whqyqth
